templates.title: Wordpress
templates.description: Wordpress setup with a MySQL database
templates.note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

templates.title: xray
templates.note: Deploys an xray server, please refer to xray doc for production deployments.

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: Your Domain
env.description: The domain name is used to apply for a digital certificate, and the domain name A points to the IP where you deploy the cloud machine

env.name: PASSWORD
env.label: Trojan Password
env.description: Password is used for trojian verification
